humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the invasive ductal carcinoma in the left breast measures 2.2 cm, which falls within the T2 category of tumors that are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this report, the tumor size is stated as 'Tumor measures 2.2 cm.' This falls within the T2 category, which includes tumors that are greater than 2 cm in size but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
